column8: Ex-imam reveals Umno leaders sexual secretsMalaysian politics was pervaded by sex again today when the former chief imam of the national mosque revealed the alleged carnal escapades of several top Umno leaders that also involved underaged women.Taib Azamudden Md Taib's revelation followed the calls by several Umno leaders urging him to disclose a "big secret" which could supposedly exonerate Prime Minister Dr Mahathir Mohamad.http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/11335Look at yourselvesIn my opinion, those who asked me to expose these secrets should look at themselves in a mirror, they will realise then that they should be the last persons to urge me to reveal these secrets, said Taib.The former imam said it was normal then for government officials to seek his views, advice, guidance and counseling concerning private and confidential issues related to Islam.My role was merely to listen, advise and counsel with sincerity based on facts, not to judge, punish or investigate, not even to condemn, said Taib who was the chief imam of the national mosque from 1992 to 1999.Read more: https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/11335#ixzz4jsCJaubM
